conversations.content: Who met with the Deputy Secretary-General of Hezbollah on July 30, 2024?
Imam Khamenei, Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met with the Deputy Secretary-General of Hezbollah, Hujjat al-Islam wal-Muslimeen Naim Qassem on Tuesday afternoon, July 30, 2024.
What did Imam Khamenei describe as a completely wise, sensible, and well-considered strategy during his meeting with Naim Qassem?
Imam Khamenei described Hezbollah's policy since the beginning of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood as a completely wise, sensible, and well-considered strategy.
What did Imam Khamenei emphasize about the continuation of Hezbollah's path?
Imam Khamenei emphasized that the continuation of Hezbollah's path should also remain within the framework of a wise, sensible, and well-considered strategy.
How did Imam Khamenei regard the coordination among various factions in Lebanon and their support for the Resistance?

Imam Khamenei regarded the existing coordination among various factions in Lebanon and their support for the positions and decisions of the Resistance as a testament to Hezbollah's success in the country’s political landscape.
What message did Imam Khamenei ask Naim Qassem to convey to Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah?
Imam Khamenei asked Naim Qassem to send his regards to Mr. Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah and let him know that he continuously prays for him and all the commanders and fighters of the Lebanese Resistance.
What report did Naim Qassem present during the meeting with Imam Khamenei?
Naim Qassem presented a report on the latest developments in Lebanon and the battles on the northern front of occupied Palestine.
On what date did Imam Khamenei meet with Naim Qassem?
Imam Khamenei met with Naim Qassem on Tuesday afternoon, July 30, 2024.
What was the title of the news article published on July 30, 2024?
The title of the news article was 'Various factions backing of the Resistance shows Hezbollah's success in Lebanese politics'.
Who is the Deputy Secretary-General of Hezbollah mentioned in the article?
The Deputy Secretary-General of Hezbollah mentioned in the article is Hujjat al-Islam wal-Muslimeen Naim Qassem.
What did Imam Khamenei describe as a testament to Hezbollah's success in Lebanon's political landscape?

Imam Khamenei described the existing coordination among various factions in Lebanon and their support for the positions and decisions of the Resistance as a testament to Hezbollah's success in the country’s political landscape.
What did Imam Khamenei emphasize about the path of Hezbollah?
Imam Khamenei emphasized that the continuation of Hezbollah's path should also remain within the framework of a wise, sensible, and well-considered strategy.
What did Imam Khamenei ask Naim Qassem to convey to Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah?
Imam Khamenei asked Naim Qassem to send his regards to Mr. Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah and let him know that he continuously prays for him and all the commanders and fighters of the Lebanese Resistance.
What was the main topic of discussion during the meeting between Imam Khamenei and Naim Qassem?

The main topic of discussion during the meeting was Hezbollah's policy since the beginning of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood, the coordination among various factions in Lebanon, and the latest developments in Lebanon and the battles on the northern front of occupied Palestine.
